thread.title: Print Bindaas Launches ADOMANIA in Association with mPower- Marketing Club, IIM Kozhikode
thread.title_full: Print Bindaas Launches ADOMANIA in Association with mPower- Marketing Club, IIM Kozhikode - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Print Bindaas Launches ADOMANIA in Association with mPower- Marketing Club, IIM Kozhikode
text:
An Online Video & Poster Making Competition for the School, College & Post- graduate students to harness creativity and talent
Mumbai, India (PRWEB UK) 28 September 2015
PrintBindaas India's premier web based printing solutions provider, has launched ADOMANIA, an online video & Poster making Competition in close collaboration with the premier Management Institute IIM Kozhikode’s Marketing Club mPower.
With an intention to equip students with skills of making an impressive & powerful Ad Campaign, the ADOMANIA connect initiative would draw entries for two categories of award money for video innovations & creative poster making. With the backdrop of college nostalgia the video or poster entries should be themed around “Why an Yearbook” & “Why Yearbook Canvas.”
Speaking on the occasion, said Suraj Goyal, CEO, Print Bindass, “We are extremely delighted as we have published over a hundred Year Books for Educational Institutes Online. With an overwhelming response to our ready-to-publish platform for Yearbooks, Catalogues, Corporate Stationery, Gifts & Novelties, we are now actively engaging with facilitating training for the school, college and post-graduate students on learning and enhancing creativity skills. Our association with IIM Kozhikode’s Marketing Interest Group mPower is a step in this direction.”
mPower, the marketing club of IIM Kozhikode, added, “We are looking at raising the creativity bar of the students community at a macro-level pan-India. mPower aims to practice and broadcast industry’s best marketing theories and we are glad as our association with Printbindass would help us leverage on our relationship with numerous students would participate online in ADOMANIA.”
Competition Details:
Make a video with the theme ‘Why an Yearbook?’, ‘Why Yearbook Canvaas?’ and upload it in your Facebook profile tagging our official Facebook Yearbook Canvas page i.e. @Yearbook Canvas and use #StoryThatLast #YearbookCanvas
The best video is awarded Rs.20,000 and the best poster gets an award worth Rs.10,000
For detailed information about the event, visit:
http://www.yearbookcanvas.com/adomania.html
For more updates please follow us on:
https://www.facebook.com/BindaasYearbooks
https://www.facebook.com/mPowerIIMK
For more information, please contact:
Naina Navlani
